title: A very Washington crisis: Debt limit debate
description: Steven Dennis, Congressional reporter at Bloomberg and Siobhan Hughes, Capitol Hill reporter for the Wall Street Journal, talk about the debate over the debt limit.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
